In 2015, the #CharlestonLoophole allowed someone w/ a criminal history to buy a gun -- even though his background check wasn't completed. 

He then used that weapon to murder 9 worshipers at bible study at the Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC. 

We must fix our broken system.

html: Welcome news: Women’s Entrepreneurship and Economic Empowerment (WEEE) Act - introduced by @RepEdRoyce & @RepLoisFrankel - passed by voice vote in the House. This bipartisan legislation addresses gender-related barriers to econ growth & supports women-led enterprises around world
